${modID}:BurningStrike.NAME: Burning Strike
${modID}:BurningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Chain is at least 2, deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:ShiningStrike.NAME: Shining Strike
${modID}:ShiningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Tactics Level is at least 2, deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Heliotrope.NAME: Heliotrope
${modID}:Heliotrope.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each material in your bag.

${modID}:MilkyWay.NAME: Milky Way
${modID}:MilkyWay.DESCRIPTION: For each material you gather, gain 1 Strength.

${modID}:EssenceOfAlchemy.NAME: Essence of Alchemy
${modID}:EssenceOfAlchemy.DESCRIPTION: Every turn, the first Craft you play will be played twice.

${modID}:MagmaPowder.NAME: Magma Powder
${modID}:MagmaPowder.DESCRIPTION: Gunpowder. Crushed lava ore in a powdered form.

${modID}:HeavenlyString.NAME: Heavenly String
${modID}:HeavenlyString.DESCRIPTION: Magical. A pure white thread reminiscent of angel feathers.

${modID}:LuckyClover.NAME: Lucky Clover
${modID}:LuckyClover.DESCRIPTION: Flower. As an alchemy ingredient, it doesn't really matter how many leaves there are.

${modID}:TemptingSap.NAME: Tempting Sap
${modID}:TemptingSap.DESCRIPTION: Poison. A dangerous sap that can melt absolutely anything.

${modID}:Arknite.NAME: Arknite
${modID}:Arknite.DESCRIPTION: Stone. An ore that contains mana.

${modID}:FluffyWool.NAME: Fluffy Wool
${modID}:FluffyWool.DESCRIPTION: Thread. A useful material gathered from sheep-type monsters.

${modID}:MossyDriftwood.NAME: Mossy Driftwood
${modID}:MossyDriftwood.DESCRIPTION: Lumber. A log completely covered in moss.

${modID}:WitchsPotion.NAME: Witch's Potion
${modID}:WitchsPotion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and inflict 2 Vulnerable and 2 Weak.

${modID}:DemonicPotion.NAME: Demonic Potion
${modID}:DemonicPotion.DESCRIPTION: Inflict slow, weaken, and vulnerable on enemy.

${modID}:Initiator.NAME: Initiator
${modID}:Initiator.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Lose !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Exhaust.

${modID}:EfficientGathering.NAME: Efficient Gathering
${modID}:EfficientGathering.DESCRIPTION: Gather 1 random material at the start of turn.

${modID}:PhotonQuasar.NAME: Photon Quasar
${modID}:PhotonQuasar.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Add 1 Void to discard.

${modID}:ShiningTrail.NAME: Shining Trail
${modID}:ShiningTrail.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, add 1 Star to hand.

${modID}:IntelligentDesign.NAME: IntelligentDesign
${modID}:IntelligentDesign.DESCRIPTION: Return all used crafted items this battle to your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:RyzaSmash.NAME: RyzaSmash
${modID}:RyzaSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal 4 damage for each level of Tactics.

${modID}:Shift.NAME: Shift
${modID}:Shift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Chain. Draw 1 card.

${modID}:CoreRecycle.NAME: Core Recycle
${modID}:CoreRecycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, gain [E] [E] and draw 1 card.

${modID}:Scrounge.NAME: Scrounge
${modID}:Scrounge.DESCRIPTION: Gather 1 Gunpowder, Thread, or Lumber. Exhaust.
